William Callaghan

  1. Foster Name: William (Billy) J.
  2. Foster Family: Timothy and Mary Ann Keefe
  3. Location of Family: Elk City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Elk City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 23 mos.
  7. Date of Birth: 6/23/1910, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2/18/1998, CA
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Madeline Keefe
  11. Source: Crossroads, Summer 1989, p. 8; Eloise Thomsen Orphan Train Register, 428; National Orphan Trian Complex; Patricia J. Young and Frances E.
